name: Obsidian Archive File
summary: Learn about .OAF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Obsidian Entertainment is a video game development company that primarily develops sequels to licensed properties. Notable Obsidian Entertainment games that use OAF files include:
South Park: The Stick of Truth
NOTE: OAF files can contain raw assets and/or Zlib-compressed assets.

description: An OAF file is an archive used by a video game developed by Obsidian Entertainment. It contains game assets, such as in-game images, audio, and text. Players are not meant to open OAF files, but modders have created tools that allow them to extract the assets that OAF files contain.

instructions: You can open an OAF file with South Park: The Stick of Truth OAF Files Extractor (Windows) or Dungeon Siege III OAF Files Extractor (Windows). Doing so will extract the assets the OAF file contains.
